short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Green Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Green background. Beautiful Green wallpaper background themes for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Green wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Randomly change the Green background or select your favorites in the wallpaper chooser.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Quick links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Direct links to your most frequently visited sites.
8. Convenient access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Share content directly to social media.
13. Download wallpapers with a single click.
14. One-click access to online gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Green new tab.
